title: American Nazis: The Aryan Freedom Network is riding high in Trump era
shortDescription: Trump “awakened a lot of people to the issues we’ve been raising for years,” Dalton Henry Stout told Reuters. “He’s the best thing that’s happened to us.”

title: Is your community an immigrant sanctuary? Trump issues new target list
shortDescription: Federal judges have halted previous efforts to crack down on communities the Trump administration says is impeding immigration enforcement.

title: Nuclear power roars back, thanks to Trump administration
shortDescription: Although it has long triggered fears of meltdowns and radioactive waste, nuclear power is considered an 'extremely safe,' zero-emission power source.

title: Is Trump making school 6 months long? No, those TikTok videos are fake
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has not suggested making the school year 6 months long, as those TikTok videos suggest. Here is what he has done.

title: FBI removes Trump case investigators
shortDescription: According to reports, the FBI removed leaders tied to Trump and Jan. 6 probes, sparking concern from the FBI Agents Association.

title: Trump willing to meet Putin without Zelenskyy
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will meet Russian President Vladimir Putin even if Putin does not first meet Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: How Trump’s new census plans could affect the 2026 election
shortDescription: The population survey helps decide how many congressional seats each state gets. Here's why a new one would matter.

title: FBI ousts more leaders who investigated Trump, reports say
shortDescription: One of those reportedly forced out is ex-acting FBI Director Brian Driscoll, who refused to go along with administration efforts to fire FBI agents.

title: Trump greenlights Putin sit-down, with or without Zelenskyy
shortDescription: Moscow faces an Aug. 8 Trump deadline to make a peace deal with Ukraine, under the threat of stiffer United States sanctions.

title: The clock is ticking for Trump's Education Department
shortDescription: The Education Department has less than a year to implement big changes to student loans and college oversight.

title: Weather Service rebuilds with new job postings after Trump cuts
shortDescription: Weather Service will hire 450 people, but experts say it won't help fill critical vacancies during current hurricane and wildfire season.

title: Was Trump Burger restaurants owner deported? No, but ICE did detain him
shortDescription: Texas chain Trump Burger went viral when its profiles online were spammed with "chicken taco" comments. There are rumors the owner was deported by ICE

title: Trump is calling for Intel's CEO to step down. Here's why.
shortDescription: The president posted on social media Aug. 7 that Intel's chief "must resign, immediately," sending stocks tumbling. Here's what to know.

title: Trump's political war in Texas is bigger than the Lone Star State
shortDescription: Spurred on by Trump, Texas Republicans redrew the boundary lines for U.S. House seats in the state. The new map creates five more GOP-leaning seats.

title: GOP senator says FBI will help track down Texas Dems who fled state
shortDescription: Sen. John Cornyn said FBI Director Kash Patel will have federal officers work with Texas state law enforcement to locate Democrats who fled the state.

title: Tim Cook gifts Trump a custom Apple plaque with 24-karat gold base
shortDescription: President Trump hosted Apple CEO Tim Cook at the White House as they announced new US investments. Cook also gifted Trump a plaque with gold base.

title: Trump & Putin: A closer look at their complex time together
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin's relationship has evolved around shifting geopolitical dynamics. See their interactions.

title: Trump orders colleges to hand over more race-related admissions data
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed a memorandum ordering colleges to be more transparent about their admissions data.

title: Trump administration mum as Israel eyes full control of Gaza
shortDescription: The U.N. has called reports about a possible expansion of Israel's military operations in Gaza "deeply alarming."

title: Trump honors 100 Purple Heart recipients at White House ceremony
shortDescription: President Trump hosted nearly 100 Purple Heart recipients injured in military action, including some veterans who gave their badges to Trump.

title: Trump to sign order opening way for alternative assets in 401(k)s,
shortDescription: The president is scheduled to sign executive orders at 12:00 ET, according to a White House public schedule.

title: Trump demands new U.S. Census — says non-citizens won't be counted
shortDescription: President Donald Trump demanded a new count of American households based on his 2024 election victory. He said non-citizens would not be included.

title: Pro-Trump group wages campaign to purge 'subversive' federal workers
shortDescription: The American Accountability Foundation wants 175 federal employees removed from their jobs for allegedly promoting liberal ideologies.
